description.description: DNP description. Should start with a 4-5 words sentence and then be as long as necessary. Markdown and links are allowed
examples: Your local IPFS node. Dappnode package responsible for providing the VPN (OpenVPN) connection

avatar.description: IPFS / BZZ hash of the Avatar of the DNP. Must be 300x300px, transparent PNG

type.description: Type of the DNP. Must be one these types

image.title: The DNP Image Schema
image.description: DNP image upload information, and its docker related properties

hash.description: IPFS / BZZ hash of the DNP image

size.description: Size of the DNP image in bytes

items.description: Docker volumes short syntax HOST:CONTAINER:ro mapping. See https://docs.docker.com/compose/compose-file/#volumes
Docker ports short syntax HOST:CONTAINER/protocol. See https://docs.docker.com/compose/compose-file/#ports

environment.description: DNP environment variables. You must declare all ENVs even if they are empty.

items.description: Docker environment variables in array form. See https://docs.docker.com/compose/compose-file/#environment

privileged.description: Grant the DNP (almost) all the capabilities of their host machine, regarding kernel features and device access. See https://blog.docker.com/2013/09/docker-can-now-run-within-docker/

restart.title: The Restart Schema
restart.description: Docker restart policy, 'always' is highly recommended. See https://docs.docker.com/compose/compose-file/#restart

ipv4_address.description: Specify a static IP address for containers for this service when joining the network. See https://docs.docker.com/compose/compose-file/#ipv4_address-ipv6_address

dependencies.description: DNP dependencies. Must be an object where the keys are the DNP's ENS. The values must be a semantic range ('0.2.0', '^0.2.1', '*', 'latest', '/ipfs/QmWwMb3XhuCH6JnCF6m6EQzA4mW9pHHtg7rqAfhDr2ofi8')

^(.*)$.description: Semantic version range or IPFS / BZZ hash

changelog.description: Description of relevant changes of this specific version. Supports markdown and links
examples: Major update to OpenVPN: This update breaks compatibility with the last VPN version. Please read the migration guide at: https://migration020.dappnode.io

warnings.title: The DNP Image Schema
warnings.description: Very relevant information that MUST be shown to the user BEFORE executing a specific action in the DNP's lifecycle.

onInstall.description: Will be shown before installing the DNP
examples: You must set the PASSWORD ENV before installing the DNP in order for the setup to work correctly.

onUpdate.description: Will be shown before updating the DNP, not in the first installation
examples: Your VPN connection will be lost when the VPN finalizes updating. Leave 1-2 minutes after executing the update and then reconnect and refresh this site.

onReset.description: Will be shown before reseting the DNP
examples: You MUST properly close your open channels before stopping this DNP or you may lose your funds.
You MUST properly close your open channels before stopping this DNP or you may lose your funds.

updateAlerts.description: Alerts targeted to a specific update jump.

from.description: Semver range, show this message when a user updates this DNP FROM a version that satisfies this range.

to.description: Semver range, show this message when a user updates this DNP TO a version that satisfies this range.

message.description: Alert message to be shown when the from and to ranges are satisfied.
examples: Major update to OpenVPN: This update breaks compatibility with the last VPN version. Please read the migration guide at: https://migration020.dappnode.io

author.description: Main author of this DNP. Must follow the structure `${name} <${email}> (${githubUserLink})`

items.description: Contributor author. Must follow the structure `${name} <${email}> (${githubUserLink})`

keywords.description: Keywords, relevant and descriptive of this DNP. They will be shown in the ADMIN's UI package store.

homepage.description: Url to an informative homepage for this DNP. Should be a README or landing website.

ui.description: Url to this DNP's DAppNode local UI.

api.description: Url to this DNP's DAppNode local HTTP API endpoint.

gateway.description: Url to this DNP's DAppNode local gateway.

repository.description: DNP's repository. Must be a publicly available url that can be handed directly to a VCS program

bugs.description: Url to your project’s issue tracker.
